description: Jaya Row is one of the most powerful speakers on Vedanta. Well-loved and popular as an inspiring spiritual leader, her expositions on Vedanta touch the mind and uplift the intellect. Backed by her experience in the corporate world and forty years of research on Vedanta, she motivates her audiences to live successful and happy lives. Clarity, wit and zeal are the hallmarks of her presentations. She has gained international recognition, having spoken at prestigious forums such as the World Economic Forum, Davos, World Bank, Young Presidents' Organization, Princeton University, Purdue University, Washington University as well as the leading corporate organisations of the world.
